Text: Clive Barker is one of my favorite authors. Thank you for sharing this.

You're most welcome, Dr.Gonzo1982. I think I may have some more Clive Barker comics that aren't available on TPB yet. Not sure when they'll go up, but keep an eye out for 'em, because I'll get around to them sooner or later.

kentcave, hey, don't think that thought hasn't crossed my mind! Sometimes I wonder if I should stop for a couple weeks and let people process, sort, read, enjoy, etc. But there are so many uploaders now that I don't think it would make any real difference. I'll just have to be at peace with the fact that there is no way people can read all this stuff as fast as it can be uploaded.
